name: Project Amaranth
description:
Project Amaranth is a Story-based dungeon crawler with a strong focus on cooperative and multiplayer play where the player can take on massive dungeons, mini games, map building, and more. The player has the ability to change their form into nine different elements based on the nine regions of the planet Nona.Features:
  • Nine elements: Nature, Earth, Fire, Water, Ice, Metal, Storm, Shadow, & Light.
  • A movement system with a high skill ceiling.
  • A versatile map editor. The player can create their own worlds!
  • Innumerable unique dungeons to explore.
  • Cooperative gameplay.
  • A variety of game modes.


Each element has its own unique move set, animations, and abilities. The player can control them all to suit their play style and the challenges of each dungeon.
The movement system is challenging, but will reward players with a variety of engaging options when moving.
Play with friends or by yourself on your own created maps through several game modes.
Use a map editor that allows you to create maps much as the developers of Project Amaranth do! With the map editor Project Amaranth will be expanded by the players to forge their own world.
